医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
新的微创治疗为原发性醛固酮主义提供了希望伦敦皇后大学，巴特斯健康NHS信托基金会和伦敦大学学院的医生领导了一种简单的，微创的针对性的热疗法（Triple T），该疗法有可能改变常见但通常被忽视的医疗管理高血压的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/new-minimally-indimally-invasive-treatment-reatment-offers-hope-for-for-primary-aldosteronism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/new-minimally-inimally-invasive-treatment-reaters-news-hope-for-for-promary-allimary-aldosterism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=110B1F73-6875-4E6E-966C-C22DC7CC599D Mon, 10 Feb 2025 12:01:36 -0500 New minimally invasive treatment offers hope for primary aldosteronism
探索户外活动如何帮助年轻的癌症幸存者为年轻人设计或存活癌症的年轻人设计的计划不多。 UIA和挪威南部医院与国际研究人员合作，旨在探索自然界的户外活动和时间如何增强健康和生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/exploring-how-outdoor-activities-can-help-young-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/exploring-how-endoor-activities-can-help-young-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c40661d-69c0-4c55-4c55-8c9d-5a03144b02e0 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 11:52:30 -0500 Exploring how outdoor activities can help young cancer survivors
混合AI方法解决了用于脑部手术的拖拉机问题大脑是一个高度复杂的神经细胞网络，该网络由细腻的途径相互联系 - 称为神经纤维或区域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/hybrid-ai-apphack-solves-problems-intrackography-formagraphy-for-brain-surery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/hybrid-ai-apphack-solves-problems-in-tractography-for-brain-surery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5749AAA6-661E-419C-85D9-749C937774E0 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 11:41:15 -0500 Hybrid AI approach solves problems in tractography for brain surgery
奥卢大学的进步生物传感器技术用于疾病检测Oulu大学处于开发尖端生物传感器技术的最前沿，该技术可能会彻底改变疾病的早期诊断和治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/university-of-youlu-advances-biosensor-dechnology-forfor-disease-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/university-of-youlu-advances-biosensor-dechnology-ford-disease-disease-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41E68A3D-877E-4422-AB3A-067917B3F470 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 09:56:00 -0500 University of Oulu advances biosensor technology for disease detection
研究发现了治疗骨髓疤痕的潜在靶标乳子状是纤维化的疤痕，超出了原始伤口的边界，通常会导致身体上的毁容和情绪困扰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/study-uncovers-potential-target-target-for-treating-keloid-scars.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/study-uncovers-potential-target-target-for-treating-keloid-scars.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d9E765D-4AAA-4125-B65B-FA2F2F2FB50EDB Mon, 10 Feb 2025 09:20:46 -0500 Study uncovers potential target for treating keloid scars
研究强调了眼基因治疗反应的性别和年龄差异新研究发现，老年妇女可能容易受到新基因疗法的有害炎症，以治疗无法治愈的眼部疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/research-highlights-gender-and-age-differences-in-eye-gene-gene-therapy-therapy-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/research-highlights-gender-and-age-differences-in-eye-gene-gene-therapy-therapy-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7664E6C4-B3DD-4933-8201-15C9CA602FE1 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 09:12:00 -0500 Research highlights gender and age differences in eye gene therapy responses
基于MSC的新型疗法为眼部GVHD治疗提供了希望移植物抗宿主病（GVHD）是干细胞移植后发生的常见且严重的并发症，其中供体的免疫细胞攻击受体的组织。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/Novel-MSC-based-therapy-provides-hope-for-ocular-GVHD-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/Novel-MSC-based-therapy-provides-hope-for-ocular-GVHD-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3A49E0EE-3289-4D05-82B5-F13E31AED281 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 08:57:19 -0500 Novel MSC-based therapy provides hope for ocular GVHD treatment
疼痛可能导致癌症幸存者中的香烟和大麻使用增加根据Wiley Online在《美国癌症协会的同行评审》杂志上发表的一项研究，经历疼痛可能会增加癌症幸存者使用香烟和大麻的几率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/pain-may-lead-to-to-increast-cigarette-cigarette-and-cannabis-use-in-cancer-in-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/pain-may-lead-to-to-increast-cigarette-cigarette-and-cannabis-use-in-cancer-in-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AA7BD507-C75B-40FB-B3C2-3C2-3DB6388AAEE7 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 08:12:00 -0500 Pain may lead to increased cigarette and cannabis use in cancer survivors
新生物标志物检测到阿尔茨海默氏病的早期tau缠结在Tau Tangles出现在脑部扫描阿尔茨海默氏病的患者中之前的几年，匹兹堡大学医学院开发的生物标志物测试可以检测到少量的易于结块的tau蛋白质及其错误折叠的病理形式，使大脑乱扔脑袋今天发表在《自然医学》上的新研究可能是血液。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/new-biomarker-test-detects-early-tau-tau-tau-tangles-in-alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/new-biomarker-test-detects-early-tau-tau-tau-tau--in-tangles-in-alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09593E25-7111-493D-9721-FAF1484440C9B Mon, 10 Feb 2025 08:01:45 -0500 New biomarker test detects early tau tangles in Alzheimer's disease
新模型揭示了在决策过程中如何处理感官提示一个新的数学模型阐明了决策过程中大脑如何处理不同的线索，例如视觉和声音。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/new-model-reveals-how-the-the-the-brain-processes-sensory-cues-dering-decision-making.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/new-model-reveals-how-the-the-the-brain-processes-sensory-cues-defing-decision-making.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e48a3620-80f1-490e-A131-E6718CD319B3 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 07:57:27 -0500 New model reveals how the brain processes sensory cues during decision making
